Name: Assassin
Description: Assassiante any agent

Name: Demolitionist
Description: Destroy any building

Name: Inside Man
Description: Discard a card from opponent's hand

Name: Hacker
Description: Discard all utilities attached to a building or agent

Name: Recruiter
Description: Remove one agent from your field, and place an opponents agent in your field

Name: Decoy
Description: When one of your agents is assassinated, destroy this card instead

Name: Theif
Description: Steal a card from the opponent's hand and place it in your hand

Name: Factory
Description: Draw 1 additional card at the start of your turn

Name: Decoy
Description: When one of your buildings is destroyed, destroy this card instead

Name: Safe House
Description: You may return one agent to your hand at the end of your turn

Name: Vault
Description: You are immune to spying (players can not look in your hand)

Name: Hotel
Description: You may have an extra agent in the field

Name: Spy
Description: Look into another player's hand

Name: Bunker Bomb
Description: Destroy a building

Name: Generator
Description: Draw 2 cards

Name: Rescue Mission
Description: Return an agent to your hand

Name: Steal
Description: Steal a random card from an opponents hand

Name: Search and Rescue
Description: Go through the discard pile and return the first agent you find and put it in your hand

Name: Rebuild
Description: Go through the discard pile and return the first building you find and put it in your hand

Name: Recruiting Mission
Description: Take an opponent's agent from the field and put it in your hand

Name: Planning
Description: Draw the top 3 cards of the deck and keep one. Discard the others

Name: Counter-assassin
Description: Block any assassination and discard the card played

Name: Protective Turret
Description: Block any sabotage and discard the card played

Name: Destroy Foundation
Description: Block any building from being played. Discard that building.

Name: Reinforced Steel
Description: Prevent any building from being destroyed.

Name: Decoy Outfil
Description: When one of your agents is assassinated, assassinate this agent instead

Name: Kevlar
Description: If this agent is assassinated, remove this utility instead

Name: Caffeine
Description: This agent may act twice per turn

Name: Building Addition
Description: The effects of this building are doubled

Name: Reinforced Concrete
Description: If this building is destroyed, remove this utility instead
